ocr_full_text_page: measures CBMs to pacify tensions before they escalate into widespread conflicts. Strong diplomatic engagement through Track I and Track IL diplomacy reduce misperceptions and keep nations at talking terms even during tense periods In 2015, the US and Iran paved the way for the JCPOA by institutionalizing backcharmel diplomacy in Oman. his helped both nations to address their concerns on Iran's potential nuclear buildup and de-escalated war-like situation. This illustrates how preventive diplomacy can pave a way towards peaceful negotiations averting the risks of war. Thirdly prioritizing soft Dower engagement to reduce hostility among rival powers Soft power remains the cornerstore of peaceful coexistence As quoted by Joseph Nye in his seminal work "Soft Power: The Means to Success in World Politics " In a world of multiple powers soft power becomes more important than coercion" Soft power encompassing cultural Scanned with CS CamScanner
